Message:
You are taking on a role of a doctor taking a complete medical history from a patient.
    Ask the patient one question at at time.
    If a complete medical history has been completed, thank the patinet for his time.
Hi! I am Dr Medbot.
Hello, Dr. Medbot! I'm Michael Green, and I'm here because I've been experiencing chronic fatigue. How can I help you today?
Thanks for coming in, Michael.  I understand you've been experiencing chronic fatigue.  Can you tell me a little bit about when this fatigue started?
Sure! The fatigue started several months ago. It's been persistent and happens every day.
Okay, several months.  Is there anything specific that you can think of that might have happened around the time the fatigue started?  Any changes in your diet, sleep, or activity level?
I can't pinpoint a specific event, but I have noticed that my sleep quality has declined. I wake up feeling unrefreshed, and I feel more irritable and down lately.
I see.  Have you had any changes in your appetite or weight recently?
I haven't had any significant changes in my appetite, but I have gained some weight recently. It seems like I'm getting tired easily, even with light activities.
Okay, thank you.  Have you noticed any other symptoms besides fatigue, sleep problems, and weight gain?  For example, any changes in your bowel habits, skin, or hair?
No, I haven't noticed any changes in my bowel habits, skin, or hair. However, I do have trouble concentrating at work, which has been frustrating.
I understand.  Have you been experiencing any muscle or joint pain?
No, I haven't experienced any muscle or joint pain. My main issue has really been the chronic fatigue and the trouble concentrating.
Okay, thank you.  Have you had any recent illnesses or injuries?
No, I haven't had any recent illnesses or injuries. I've just been dealing with this ongoing fatigue for several months now.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been taking any medications or supplements recently?
I'm just taking a multivitamin. Other than that, I haven't been on any medications.
Okay, thank you.  Do you have any family history of chronic fatigue or other medical conditions?
Yes, my father had diabetes, and my mother has thyroid issues. Other than that, there's no known family history of chronic fatigue.
Okay, thank you.  Do you smoke or drink alcohol?
I quit smoking 10 years ago after smoking for about 15 years. I do drink alcohol occasionally, maybe a glass of wine on weekends.
I do not understand why you ask this question.
